name: Bomberman 64: Arcade Edition
overview:
Bomberman 64 Arcade Edition has nothing to do with 1997’s Baku Bomberman, also known as Bomberman 64 outside Japan. The game was the last official N64 game to be released in Japan.

This game has several types of gameplay, each with its own mode. The names are loosely translated based upon the gameplay they exhibit; Classic Mode, Panic Bomber Mode, Point and Click Game, and Bomberman Park.
